document.full_text: at least 10 people have been killed and 83 wounded in the southern afghan city of kandahar, officials said on saturday, on a second day of violent protests over the burning of a koran by a radical fundamentalist christian in the united states.
document.title: ten dead on second day of afghan koran burning protests
lines_and_colors: at least 10 people have been killed and 83 wounded in the southern afghan city of kandahar, officials said on saturday, on a second day of violent protests over the burning of a koran by a radical fundamentalist christian in the united states.
